description: Cognitive Car Dashboard workspace which allows multi-turn conversations to perform tasks in the car.

values: Sorry I haven't learned answers to questions like this.
That question is out of scope for this application, take a look at the Conversation Enhanced application to handle questions like these.
Last time you had $previous_cuisine, would you like that again?

values.text: Which one would you like to drive to?

generic.title: I understand you want me to find a location. I can find one of these nearby locations.

values.text: These are the gas stations nearby. Which one would you like to drive to?

dialog_nodes.title: Catch-All Response For Other Requested Locations

values.text: One moment while I check for you.

generic.title: Sorry I don't have a listing for that and cannot drive you there. I can find one of these nearby locations.

values.text: There are a number of restaurants nearby. Which cuisine would you like?
